justification: “Underneath the forecast, a scale ranging from 1 (no damage) to 7 (severe damage) was displayed… Your task is to estimate the level of damage… using the damage scale provided below the map.”
“Participants also reported their confidence in their predictions on a Likert scale ranging from 1 (not at all confident) to 7 (very confident) for every trial.”
“Lastly, at the end of the experiment, participants answered three questions related to comprehension of the hurricane forecasts… The results of the survey questions can be found in Table 2.”

measured_by: Damage change score (difference between on-line and off-line damage ratings)
justification: “We transformed the dependent variable by calculating the difference between the on-line damage ratings and off-line damage ratings… The transformation produced a damage change score where zero indicates no collocation effect.”
